    • Method Detail

      • poll

        PollResult poll()
         throws IfmapErrorResult,
                EndSessionException,
                IfmapException
        Send a poll on the ARC. This is a blocking method that returns when the poll results from the MAPS have been received.
        Returns:
        the poll results that have been received from the MAPS
        Throws:
        IfmapErrorResult
        EndSessionException
        IfmapException
